subject: United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Nikolay Davydenko defeated Tommy Haas and became the third Russian in as many matches to advance to the semifinals in straight sets, joining Anna Chakvetadze and Svetlana Kuznetsova.
snippet: Nikolay Davydenko defeated Tommy Haas and became the third Russian in as many matches to advance to the semifinals in straight sets, joining Anna Chakvetadze and Svetlana Kuznetsova.
